Reviews.Title: “Overall good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: SnowshineWalesUK
Reviews.Content: hotel close metro station green line handy visiting major attractions via metro quick easy area many shops supermarkets cafes restaurants seemed quiet safe even late night room second floor good size clean room serviced daily downside sofa bed comfortable free wifi available ask access code password front desk staff friendly helpful need one device laptop room free use breakfast buffet style thought expensive euros adults 3 euro children late departure leave cases return later collect would recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “excellent value for money”
Reviews.Author: newlifeinn
Reviews.Content: great location near metro station good buffet breakfast free parking small shops restaurants near hotel free wireless internet room excellent choice good location

Reviews.Title: “It was a place to sleep”
Reviews.Author: KeltieJ
Reviews.Content: hotel nothing special location isnt really close anything although train line able get downtown fairly easily costs take taxi airport wifi works lobby pool high tech shower didnt work properly hotel 50 eur night though get pay

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Patrick M
Reviews.Content: 20 mins metro less cab think hotel perfectly situated visit central madrid close metro clean efficient friendly part spanish group recommended without doubt mr van old london town

Reviews.Title: “Memorable stay”
Reviews.Author: Oscar456
Reviews.Content: loved location near metro bars mall supermarkets blast staff great service good go back without hesitation nothing bad say wait go back

Reviews.Title: “Good location, some hiccups in visiting experience”
Reviews.Author: hmart61
Reviews.Content: stayed high tech madrid 2 nights returning san francisco promised exactly needed hotel situated within block metro station important wanted visit prado museums total 8 stops away one transfer middle museums free onsite parking although parking area small full checked street parking close free wifi included computer every room close airport since leaving soon visiting experience room computer working booking promised bottle wine check wine unable connect wifi connected cable liked hotel staff would 5 5

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Cozy”
Reviews.Author: Florida50Couple
Reviews.Content: good experience staff friendly helped answer questions rooms clean house keeping notch close airport nice area shopping mall across street nice close metro would much recommend hotel anyone staying madrid

Reviews.Title: “So sad to say adios to Madrid...”
Reviews.Author: klasallejr
Reviews.Content: good modern hotel madrid suburb handy driving youre happy use metro get city centre lobby stayed two free pcs printer werent working rectified later helpful staff laptops room anyway late checkin problem able extend checkout 1pm rooms good size tv laptop provided free internet access thus high tech title guess sure wifi didnt need also massage jets shower cubicle may find exciting guess parking hotel car park full arrived however weekend seems like street parking free little difficulty parking road hotel took 1015 minutes get sunday though metro 23 minutes walk residential area theres small shopping centre metro takes 25 minutes get central madrid directly opera la

Reviews.Title: “Adequate hotel for business trip - but lacking character”
Reviews.Author: Sinbad02
Reviews.Content: hotel conveniently located business trip 1015 minutes drive airport meals served hotel charming restaurant within 5 minutes walking distance hotel called la rooms good size stay peaceful enough bought laptop given print code use free internet access bathroom large plastic unit corner shower upon time water however longer working apart jet water shower head rather relaxing spray breakfast adequate certainly worth 22 euros extra cost total paid 1 night hotel fine probably look around alternative next time

Reviews.Title: “Good value Hotel in a safe area”
Reviews.Author: ABRH
Reviews.Content: think pictures reviewers generous compliments hotel dont like hotels try something four star hotel three star best review pros cons pros metro stop close ac works well room bed somewhat comfortable cons halls dont ac elevator tiny showers horrible mold bad tile bathrooms marble tile kind picture marble front desk helpful sent us wrong metro stop couldnt call us cab couldnt tell us restaurant walking distance hotel paid 75 euro room double bed pull couch wouldnt return

Reviews.Title: “Noisy Hotel”
Reviews.Author: goonerwong
Reviews.Content: came back 5 nights stay took 20 minutes get hotel central madrid although hotel close metro laptop shower good flat screen tv less useful could find cnn spanish channels spanish speakers try stay first floor especially rooms main door hotel hear bang everytime someone goes hotel asked moved offered second floor room unfortunately second floor amongst spanish students common sense regarding late hours sound volume made lot noise shouting across corridors slamming doors mornings late night one night lost went shouting quiet let us get sleep complained hotel things got better holiday spoiled may unlucky

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel I have stayed in while in Madrid”
Reviews.Author: tek1025
Reviews.Content: wife stayed spain best hotel stayed spain location quiet street away hustle noise downtown madrid 200 yards metro station get downtown quickly clean modern tastefully decorated wood rooms plenty space flat screen tv laptop computer free internet room large bathroom large shower impressed location staff friendly stay next time madrid

Reviews.Title: “A rare find in terms of value”
Reviews.Author: ethelstan
Reviews.Content: stayed four nights mid july 2008 stayed double room elderly background could consider frequent traveler around europe quiet experience compare one hotel another high tech would certainly one best hotel ive terms good balance money quality room looks new clean modern surprised room laptop least 32 inch lcd tv full cable tv access another surprise shower massage shower although didnt work thought would wasnt really view room since room facing brick building didnt concern us much staff speaks enough english accomodate needs although didnt ask guidance exploring madrid time pleasant aspect hotel first checkin long receptionist took around 15 minutes get room pre booked advance via showed relief saying finally since already charged full credit card already called secure room credit card cant imagine able find room another let fact bathtub kettle water bed quality could improved hotel location close metro maybe less 10 minutes walk heading straight city dont need change line hotel also reasonably close airport took around less 15 minutes travel car metro took around 40 minutes since need change train 3 times paid per night think hotel rare find hostels cost around 10 euro cheaper got massive drop terms quality certainly hotels similar quality costing 60 euro found located remote location suggest look dont mind hotels outside city little bit close metro would certainly recommend hotel travelers

Reviews.Title: “Very nice place, possibly a five.”
Reviews.Author: Anonymous-Atlanta
Reviews.Content: family four stayed room high tech one short night 8 pm leaving next morning airport room plenty large enough accomodate us name hotel high tech laptop room showers modern well one beds couch still comfortable also exercise bike room parking front lobby lounge quite modern major plus hotel one block away metro stop getting back downtown hotel also 10 minutes airport

Reviews.Title: “Good location and quiet”

Reviews.Content: hotel definitely adequate good bad points good points nice neighbourhood close metro station reception staff incredibly helpful bad points although bad shower didnt work properly beds extremely hard air con noisy however good stay managed enjoy madrid much booked visit august although ive booked hotel outdoor pool time weather much warmer took drinks minibar stored bit worked try breakfast hotel preferred get early found food whilst got ripped taxi getting hotel first place airport 30 mins got taxi refused go meter charged 45 euros get hotel return airport took private minibus cost euros still bit pricey least knew price set metro station something like wasnt far places wanted visit zoo great managed find lots nice places eat places like hard rock suited us fine next hotel hotel couple stops farther hotel look review one 20th august

Reviews.Title: “Comfort, Quiet & a Metro Ride”
Reviews.Author: Verdad
Reviews.Content: stayed last night spain travelling back wouldnt long trip airport next morning car free parking right front hotel welcome surprise drive ten minutes airport interior pleasant room spacious clean bathroom great shower look business hotel saw groups looked like business travellers outside terrace nice sit drink residential area knowing madrid used live nice area find real madrid pretty area lined friendly shops restaurants close take metro tourists sites really long ride look metro map hotel would stop might stay madrid near plaza mayor visit tourist sites escape back neighborhood

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: good hotel nice area friendly helpful staff showers excellent beds comfortable however tv room english speaking channels good free access internet reception rooms clean could hear next door night brilliant sandwich shop around corner fantastic links metro

Reviews.Title: “Very Friendly Hotel”
Reviews.Author: peppie
Reviews.Content: hotel adequate business traveler somewhere read close airport residential neighborhood major hard get airport close downtown either staff pleasant terribly helpful would stay particular part madrid
